com.varmateo.yawg.api

Interface BakeOptions


  • public interface BakeOptions
    Set of configuration parameters for baking a site with a SiteBaker instance.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  BakeOptions.Builder 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<Path> assetsDir()
      Path of directory containing the assets files.
      static BakeOptions.Builder builder() 
      Map<String,Object> externalPageVars()
      Set of page variables provided externally.
      Path sourceDir()
      Path of directory containing the documents to be baked.
      Path targetDir()
      Path of directory where the results of the baking will be stored.

    • Method Detail

      • assetsDir

        Optional<Path> assetsDir()
        Path of directory containing the assets files. These files will be copied without any changes to the target directory.

        An empty Optional means no assets will be copied.

      • sourceDir

        Path sourceDir()
        Path of directory containing the documents to be baked.

      • targetDir

        Path targetDir()
        Path of directory where the results of the baking will be stored.

      • externalPageVars

        Map<String,Object> externalPageVars()
        Set of page variables provided externally.

        Page variables are intended to be used by templates.

        Returns:
        A read-only map containing the page variables. Keys in the map are the variable names.

      • builder

        static BakeOptions.Builder builder()
